tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE telemedicine_consultations (
    consultation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    doctor_id INT,
    consultation_date TIMESTAMP,
    consultation_notes TEXT,
    patient_iot_data JSONB
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
  patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  health_condition VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE health_data (
  data_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id UUID REFERENCES patients(patient_id),
  data_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  heart_rate INT,
  blood_pressure VARCHAR(20),
  blood_oxygen_level FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE patient_data (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(100),
    patient_age INT,
    patient_gender VARCHAR(10),
    iot_data JSON
)

CREATE TABLE consultation_history (
    consultation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    doctor_id INT,
    consultation_date TIMESTAMP,
    consultation_notes TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE doctor_profile (
    doctor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    doctor_name VARCHAR(100),
    doctor_specialization VARCHAR(100),
    doctor_location VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE consultations (
	consultation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	patient_id INT,
	doctor_id INT,
	consultation_date DATE,
	status VARCHAR(20),
	FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patient_data(patient_id),
	FOREIGN KEY (doctor_id) REFERENCES doctors(doctor_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  patient_age INT,
  patient_gender VARCHAR(10),
  patient_contact VARCHAR(15)
)

CREATE TABLE Doctors (
  doctor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  doctor_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  doctor_specialty VARCHAR(50),
  doctor_contact VARCHAR(15)
)

CREATE TABLE Appointments (
  appointment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  doctor_id INT,
  appointment_date DATE,
  appointment_time TIME,
  appointment_status VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE IoTDevices (
  device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  device_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  device_type VARCHAR(50),
  device_status VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE PatientData (
  data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  device_id INT,
  data_type VARCHAR(50),
  data_value VARCHAR(255),
  data_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)
